text.p: Consider all functions of the form [mathjaxinline]f(x) = ax^2 + c[/mathjaxinline], where [mathjaxinline]a[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]c[/mathjaxinline] are real numbers. Find a function of that form which achieves the least squared vertical distance to the data points [mathjaxinline](-1, 1), (0,1), (1, 2),[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline](2, -1)[/mathjaxinline].
